articles.description: Here's our score prediction and scouting report of LSU's final regular season game of the year at Texas A&M.
articles.content: BATON ROUGE - The No. 5 LSU football team will look to finish its regular season slate with a sixth-consecutive win as the Tigers travel to College Station and face Texas A&M on Saturday (6 p.m.,… [+4183 chars]
